body:
This change makes me nervous.

1. There are a lot of other `const Comparator&` arguments in this file; why is only this one changed?

2. What if Comparator is not cheap to copy? Now you've hugely pessimized this function.
body_html:
This change makes me nervous.

  1. There are a lot of other const Comparator& arguments in this file; why is only this one changed?

  2. What if Comparator is not cheap to copy? Now you've hugely pessimized this function.

What if Comparator is not cheap to copy? Now you've hugely pessimized this function.
